Parameters.Name: METADATA STREAMING (RTP-Unicast/UDP)
Parameters.Description: Use root/1 user name and password on Discovery tab

Test.Name: Analytics and PTZ is supported
Test.Description:
GetCapabilities: supported Scope list contains onvif://www.onvif.org/Profile/Streaming Discovery feature: supported Discovery/Types/dn:NetworkVideoTransmitter feature: supported WS-Basic notification: supporetd NTP: Supported WS-Username token: supported MediaService: supported Real-Time Streaming feature: supported
!!! Before this test case make sure that DUT has dn:NetworkVideoTransmitter discovery type !!!

Test.Name: PTZ is supported and Analytics is not supported
Test.Description:
GetCapabilities: supported Scope list contains onvif://www.onvif.org/Profile/Streaming Discovery feature: supported Discovery/Types/dn:NetworkVideoTransmitter feature: supported WS-Basic notification: supporetd NTP: Supported WS-Username token: supported MediaService: supported Real-Time Streaming feature: supported
!!! Before this test case make sure that DUT has dn:NetworkVideoTransmitter discovery type !!!

Test.Name: Analytics is supported and PTZ is not supported
Test.Description:
GetCapabilities: supported Scope list contains onvif://www.onvif.org/Profile/Streaming Discovery feature: supported Discovery/Types/dn:NetworkVideoTransmitter feature: supported WS-Basic notification: supporetd NTP: Supported WS-Username token: supported MediaService: supported Real-Time Streaming feature: supported
!!! Before this test case make sure that DUT has dn:NetworkVideoTransmitter discovery type !!!

Test.Name: Streaming from 226 camera
Test.Description: Use root/1 login and password on Discovery Tab DUT simulator returns uri from 226 camera

Test.Name: Correct: one media profile PTZ and Analytics features should supported
Test.Description: Use Features.01_01 Use service/1 login and password on Discovery Tab DUT simulator returns uri from 230 camera

Test.Name: two media profile. Second profile has MDC2 and MDC2 metadataOptions.Extension.CompressionType skiped
Test.Description: Use Features.01_01 Use service/1 login and password on Discovery Tab DUT simulator returns uri from 230 camera

Test.Name: two media profile. Second profile has MDC2 and MDC2 metadataOptions.Extension contains CompressionType with value equals to None
Test.Description: Use Features.01_01 Use service/1 login and password on Discovery Tab DUT simulator returns uri from 230 camera

Test.Name: two media profile. Second profile has MDC2 and MDC2 metadataOptions.Extension skiped
Test.Description: Use Features.01_01 Use service/1 login and password on Discovery Tab DUT simulator returns uri from 230 camera

Test.Name: Correct: two media profile. Without Annex 32 (Add PTZ Configuration) and Annex 33 (Add Analytics Configuration) without restore
Test.Description: !!!Check, That DUT not supports Analytics and PTZ, run with all features not supported!!! Use service/1 login and password on Discovery Tab DUT simulator returns uri from 230 camera

Test.Name: Correct: two media profile. Without Annex 32(Add PTZ Configuration), metadataOptions PTZ feelds = true
Test.Description: !!! Use Features01.03 !!! Use service/1 login and password on Discovery Tab DUT simulator returns uri from 230 camera

Test.Name: Correct: two media profile. Without Annex 32, metadataOptions PTZ feelds = false
Test.Description: !!! Use Features01.01 !!! Use service/1 login and password on Discovery Tab DUT simulator returns uri from 230 camera

Test.Name: Correct: two media profile. MediaProfile2 is used. Exist step 4 from testSpec
Test.Description: Use features.01_01 - PTZ and Analytics supported Use service/1 login and password on Discovery Tab DUT simulator returns uri from 230 camera

Test.Name: Correct: two media profile, second used, with step 4 from testSpec, without annex 33
Test.Description: Use features.01_02 - PTZ supported and Analytics not supported Use service/1 login and password on Discovery Tab DUT simulator returns uri from 230 camera

Test.Name: Correct: one media profile without VSC. PTZ and Analytics features should supported, annex A.37 no remove command (profList[0].configurations is empty)
Test.Description: check that on step 3 command GetVideoSourceConfigurations Use Features.01_01 Use service/1 login and password on Discovery Tab DUT simulator returns uri from 230 camera

Test.Name: Correct: one media profile without MDC. PTZ and Analytics features should supported
Test.Description: check that on step 3 command GetVideoSourceConfigurations Use Features.01_01 Use service/1 login and password on Discovery Tab DUT simulator returns uri from 230 camera

Test.Name: one media profile, Test Annex A.32 ptzConfigurationList is empty, no Add command for PTZConfig
Test.Description: Use Features.01_01 Use service/1 login and password on Discovery Tab DUT simulator returns uri from 230 camera

Test.Name: Correct: one media profile without VSC. PTZ and Analytics features should supported, annex A.37 no remove command (profList[0].configurations = null)
Test.Description: check that on step 3 command GetVideoSourceConfigurations Use Features.01_01 Use service/1 login and password on Discovery Tab DUT simulator returns uri from 230 camera

Test.Name: No metadataOptions that does not contain Extension element or that contains metadataOptions.Extension with CompressionType with value equals to None
No metadataOptions that does not contain Extension element or that contains metadataOptions.Extension with CompressionType with value equals to None, 2VSC
VSC list is empty
Test.Description: Use service/1 login and password on Discovery Tab DUT simulator returns uri from 229 camera

Test.Name: Incorrect: getStreamUri returned uri for 229 camera (not support metadata)
Test.Description: Use Features.01_01 Use service/1 login and password on Discovery Tab DUT simulator returns uri from 230 camera

Test.Name: No one media profiles fail on step5 from test spec
